name: Mica Pandora (Profile Pic Support)
description: My styles are moving to the Userstyles.world platform. You can continue using this style, however it is likely to break in the future as it will no longer be updated. To continue supporting my work and receive future updates, please download this style here. You'll need the Stylus extension, which is free and open-source at the Chrome Web Store. Hope to see you there!
